DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate patient receive multihole revision acetabular implant total hip arthroplasty ( THA ) follow 10 year collect data survivorship implanted prosthesis .
DOC.brief_title: Survivorship , Radiographic , Functional Outcomes Multihole Revision Acetabular Cup
DOC.detailed_description: Data collect preoperatively , standard care ( SOC ) office visit 4 week , 1 year , 2 year , 5 year 10 year postoperatively . The research coordinator site identify , recruit , prospectively follow 60 patient his/her site . Patient demographic ( e.g. , age , gender , body mass index ( BMI ) ) , comorbidities , reason revision , Paprosky classification , native femoral head measurement ( mm ) etc . collect preoperatively . The study coordinator contact patient prior visit ensure patient compliance . At visit , A-P cross-lateral radiographic evaluation ( i.e. , use Engh classification quantify osteolysis/loosening ) occur . In addition , patient assess complication ( e.g. , dislocation , emergency department visit , infection , reoperation , etc. ) . Patients complete Hip disability Osteoarthritis Outcome Score ( HOOS ) Veterans Rand 12 ( VR-12 ) form ( include specific question regard groin pain ) pain assessment . In event patient relocate and/or refuse return office 5-year visit , script send patient x-rays do sent PI , questionnaires mail . All data enter maintained RedCap .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients require revision total hip replacement acetabular component complicate primary total hip replacement . 2 . Femoral stem ( either retain replace ) compatible Stryker stem . 3 . Patient willing comply followup requirement ( e.g . return longterm followup visit ) 4 . Age : 1885 year 1 . Patient BMI > 40 2 . Exclude revision infection 3 . Patient undergoing bilateral THA surgery prior hip arthroplasty contralateral side less 6 month date surgery 4 . Patient history radiation therapy 5 . Patient known diagnosis renal disease 6 . Patient known diagnosis osteoporosis
